properties.areaDesc: Southern Inner Channels; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 9 at 4:42AM AKST until January 10 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow
accumulations of up to 1 inch. For the Winter Storm Warning,
heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches,
with isolated higher amounts possible.

* WHERE...Prince of Wales Island and the Southern Inner Channels
including Ketchikan, Klawock, Edna Bay, Thorne Bay, Whale Pass, and
Kasaan.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM AKST early
this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this
evening to 3 PM AKST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy
snow could be difficult to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a brief break between the
snow showers this morning and the steadier snowfall beginning
this evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST FRIDAY
